title: Community Management & Engagement
content: Building and managing online communities for blockchain projects, including Twitter and discord platforms.

title: Social Media Marketing
content: Developing and executing social media marketing strategies for the Web3 ecosystem, targeting platforms such as Twitter, Telegram, Reddit and Discord.

title: Content Marketing
content: Developing content strategies and producing blog articles, whitepapers, case studies, and educational materials targeting specific blockchain audiences.

title: Influencer Marketing
content: Identifying and collaborating with influencial figures in the blockchain and crypto space to amplify brand reach and credibility.

title: Token Marketing and ICO/IDO Launch
content: Developing marketing strategies that are custom made for our WEB3 partners needs.

title: Marketing Strategy
content: Planning & executing marketing strategies and compaigns to raise awareness and promote Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs) and Initial Decentralized Exchange Offerings (IDOs).
